metadata.title: CVE-2019-13240 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GLPI before 9.4.1. After a successful passwordreset by a user, it is possible to change that user's password again duringthe next 24 hours without any information except the associated emailaddress.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
